entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 08:51 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -22.7°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm in areas south of Fort McMurray. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
